jei.emcworld.recipe.update: Right-click the air when item in hand on the station
jei.emcworld.hazmat_desc: Can only withstand radiation below 50000 Sv/h
jei.emcworld.advanced_update_desc:
The core block and base block are built with beacon structures similar to each other. The building blocks of each color have different levels. Their corresponding colors from level 1 to level 8 are: purple, bx, blue, green, yellow, orange, and red.
Each layer needs building blocks of corresponding level or higher level. At the same time, you can also use the adjustment blocks of current level or higher level to make the composite CD, consumption and additional output change.
Each synthesis brings a 900 second cooldown, and players who enter the cooldown cannot synthesize.
Players can press the Stealth key for multiple synthesis at one time.
When synthesizing, you need to right click on the air. Right click on the core to open its page and display relevant information.

message.hurt.tulye: §1You feel like your surroundings suddenly become more oppressive
message.hurt.tulye1: §cYour curse has been cleared, at the cost of clearing other effects on you as well
message.log.sponsor: You have entered the game %d times. Would you consider sponsoring our development team
message.admin.permission: §4This feature is only available to server administrators in creative mode!
message.final.thanks: §2Thank you for playing the EMCWorld! Your current difficulty level is %d §2. You may be able to try higher difficulty or hardcore mode to gain a different gaming experience~
message.final_diff1:
§2After your efforts, you have become the ruler of the Elf Dynasty, and all the elves are at your command!
But have you ever imagined that there is still a force on the other side of the world that has not been fully conquered.
message.final_diff2:
§2You have grasped the essence of technology, and you have successfully conquered this world with technology.
But you always feel a strange sound lingering in your ear.
message.final_diff3:
§2You have conquered the emc world and truly become the master of this world.
But is there a power of detachment in any corner of this world?
message.final_diff4: §2You have mastered the entire world, and now you are the master of this world!
message.doing_diff1:
§2You have successfully conquered the Elven Kingdom and become the ruler of the Elven Dynasty.
But you know, you need to continue conquering the entire world.
message.doing_diff2:
§2You have conquered this world using technology.
But your ambition drives you to conquer further and stronger forces.
message.doing_diff3:
§2You have mastered everything in the emc world and become the hegemon of the world.
At this point, you have become possessed and want to gain more powerful power.

screen.pcl.title: §4Warning: You are using a PCL2 launcher that is not supported by the EMCWorld!
screen.pcl.line1: Although PCL is an excellent launcher, there are the following issues in EMCWorld:
screen.pcl.line2: Due to the unique crash guessing module function of PCL, sometimes due to block generation issues, the word "world" will be generated in the log, so PCL will guess that EMCWorld did it.
screen.pcl.line3: However, after multiple tests by the author, this is actually not the case.
screen.pcl.line4: This means that the log compression package exported by PCL is invalid. If you need feedback, please submit the latest.log file to the author team.
screen.pcl.line5: As long as you use the PCL launcher, this window will pop up every time you start the game.
screen.emc.title: EMC Cost Confirm
screen.emc.desc: It costs you %d EMC to perform this operation
screen.addmod.title: §4Warning:You added an additional mods!
screen.addmod.line: EMCWorld does not recommend adding other mods, but now you have added other mods
screen.addmod.line1: Therefore, from now on, do not report any errors that occur to the author
screen.addmod.line2: If you report this issue to the author, you will be hacked by the author on the corresponding platform
emcworld.constellation.emc.description: The constellation born through the accumulation of long-term EMC energy This is a constellation exclusive to the world of mass and energy, containing unlimited EMC.
emcworld.constellation.emc.ritual:
Absorb the life of non player creatures around and convert it into pure EMC energy. Starlight will convert these pure energies into material form of EMC.
But due to the greed of the zodiac sign, there will be no dropped objects for creatures killed through the zodiac sign.
emcworld.constellation.emc.corruption: After energy reversal, it no longer absorbs life, but generates pure EMC based on the current radiation dose in the region. Of course, it will still fall in the form of an item.
emcworld.constellation.emc.enchantments:
Weapon: The power of EMC is powerful and cannot be countered. Therefore, it will sharpen your blade to an unmatched sharpness.
Armor: Constellations are greedy, providing you with additional protection while further eroding your EMC.
Potion: After drinking, resonate with your zodiac sign, and your zodiac sign will reduce your consumption when consuming EMC.
emcworld.constellation.emc.mantle: Consuming EMC is like hitting a sharp edge on oneself, isn't it? Perhaps the cloak provides better protection for the sharp blade.

quest.emcworld_stage_two: Looks like you have some skills

quest.emcworld.lets_go.subtitle: Get some wood first!
quest.emcworld.find_snow_villager: Find the guy in the snow workshop
quest.emcworld.find_snow_villager1: Find the other guy in the snow workshop
quest.emcworld.waystone.desc:
In the Energy Matter World, you cannot use commands (mini-map) to teleport, so you need to use Waystones for teleportation.
Teleporting between Waystones no longer consumes experience, but EMC.
Using a teleport stone can avoid consuming EMC, but there is a long cooldown time.
quest.emcworld.mk1_desc:
Note: After completing this quest, you will lose the novice protection. This means that more events will consume EMC when triggered. 
At the same time, the parentheses next to your EMC value represent the death protection value. If you die and your EMC is lower than this value, all your items will drop on the ground! 
You can check the specific consumption by holding the EMC Viewer and right-clicking to query.
quest.emcworld.steel_ingot: Steel recipe is a bit different... I mean... just a bit
quest.emcworld.jetpack: You can fly, but not quite

quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help_des: Due to some reasons, the recipes for this mod will be displayed in the form of images here.
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help_1_d: Both bottom slots of this type of synthesis table are radiant stones, which are not included in the list of materials for synthesis.
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help_2_d: The synthesis table has two gold Radiant Stones on each end, two Carving Hammers at the bottom, and two blank Carving Symbols in the center. These items are not included in the specific crafting material list.
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help1_de:
Materials required:
Knowledge Carving Symbol2, Radiant Carving Symbol2, Radiant Stone2, Gold Radiant Stone2, Stick1
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help2_de:
Materials required:
Energy Carving Symbol1, Radiant Carving Symbol1, Netherworld Carving Symbol1, Life Core1, Moon Steel1, Moon Alloy Ingot2, Stick1
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help3_de:
Materials required:
Knowledge Carving Symbol2, Radiant Carving Symbol2, Blood Crystal1, Water Crystal1, Green Quartz1, Life Core1, Empty Talisman1
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help4_de:
Materials required:
Eclipse Shard2, Soul Prism2
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help5_de:
Materials required:
Radiant Carving Symbol2, Bloodstone Fragment2
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help6_de:
Materials required:
Moon Crystal Powder2, Green Quartz2
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help7_de:
Materials required:
Netherworld Carving Symbol2, Pearl Fragment2
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help8_de:
Materials required:
Knowledge Carving Symbol2, Green Quartz2
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help9_de:
Materials required:
Moon Crystal2, Moon Crystal Powder4
Core: Stick
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help10_d:
Materials required:
Moon Crystal Powder6
Core: Obsidian
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help11_d:
Material Requirements:
Life Essence *6
Core: Tears of Mora
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help12_d:
Material Requirements:
Soul Prism *4, Moon Crystal *2
Core: Life Essence Ingot
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help13_d:
Material Requirements:
Powdered Moon Crystal *4, Life Essence *2
Core: Moon Crystal
quest.emcworld.sixth_afterlight_help14_d:
Material Requirements:
Pearl Fragment *2, Life Essence *4
Core: Soul Prism
quest.emcworld.fifth_hals_transporter_de:
How can there be teleporters that stretch out two black hands to grab people?
 
 
 PS. See left image for transporter construction. Make sure the block arrangement and orientation are consistent with the image.

The corruption of the Nether erupts

Note: Placing 4 Netherite blocks next to the portal can stop the spread

quest.emcworld.fifth_magic_aure_desc: When infusing items to summon creatures, nature spirits are constantly consuming spiritual energy. Therefore, it is necessary to create an automatic spiritual energy production device to prevent depletion of spiritual energy.

pss. It's Reyvor, not Revyof!
